          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy transferred from a bulb</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie übertragen von einer Birne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie transférée à partir d'une ampoule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia transferida de um bulbo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia trasferita da una lampadina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενέργεια που μεταφέρεται από έναν βολβό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Energía transferida de un bulbo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that a bulb transfer its energy (light and heat) to its surroundings.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bulb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermal energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt daß eine Birne 
Übertragung seine Energie (Licht und Hitze) auf seine Umlagerungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve qu'un transfert 
d'ampoule son énergie (lumière et chaleur) à ses environnements.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que transferência do 
bulbo sua energia (luz e calor) a seus arredors.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che un trasferimento 
della lampadina la relativa energia (luce e calore) nei relativi 
dintorni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ένας βολβός μεταφέρει
την ενέργειά του (φως και θερμότητα) στα περίχωρά του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que una transferencia 
del bulbo su energía (luz y calor) a sus alrededores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Birne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
